item.description:
Join the Greater Boston Divorced, Separated and Friends meetup for an evening of music and dancing.

Lessons at 8:00, the Band starts playing at 9:00.Â  Admission is $16 for the whole evening.

Roger Ceresi's All Starz, Always a great time! Featured annually at Providence's "Waterfire", this great band is comprised of "some of the finest R&B players on the planet.

PAYING TRIBUTE TO THE GREATEST "MUSIC LEGENDS" OF THE 50'S & 60'S! Louis Prima, Fats Domino, Elvis, Chuck Berry, Jr. Parker, B. B. King, Ray Charles, Jr. Guitar Watson, Big Joe Turner, Percy Mayfield, Clarence Carter, Albert Collins, Lloyd Price; just to name a few ...
REMEMBER "Sea Cruise", "Ain't that a Shame", "A Good Fool is Hard to Find", "What I'd Say", "Hot Little Mama", "Don't be Cruel", Just Because", "Lawdy Miss Clawdy", "Johnny B Good", "All Shook Up"?
item.name: Swing Dance to Roger Ceresi's All Starz
